video.title: Dakchigo Kkotminambaendeu
video.synopsis: Five boys from a poor village who make up the popular underground band Rock Candy transfer to a new school full of snobby rich kids.

episodes.synopsis: Eye Candy is the #1 band of Gaechi-Dong province in Korea. Thanks to their rough charm, good looks and true rock spirit, the band members have female fans of all ages. But at their latest gig, the police rush in!
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After having gone through hell and high water, Eye Candy finally walks into Jung Sang high school, but in the wrong school uniform. The minute they step onto the school grounds, the band feels tension and hatred from the teachers.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The members of Eye Candy struggle to deal with their tragic loss, while tensions rise between them and the rival school band, Strawberry Fields.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Eye Candy is put in an unpleasant position when they are forced to rely on their rival band, Strawberry Fields, to keep them in school.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Eye Candy cannot understand why Ji Hyuk gave up the practice room battle to save Su Ah. Strawberry Fields is not happy, despite their win on the battle, after Eye Candy got the 2nd place and made themselves to the Rock Festival.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Finally, the battle between Eye Candy and Strawberry Fields! Eye Candy practices like never before and feels good about themselves. They are practicing hard for Byung Hee, who is watching from above.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Su Ah and Ji Hyuk kissed on the rooftop under the moonlight. Su Ah begins to avoid Ji Hyuk, and Seung Hoon reveals his feelings for Su Ah, determined tobecome her man instead of a friend.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hyuk boldly shreds the contract offered by one of the top producing companies. Eye Candy is determined to have all five members sign the contract. Can Eye Candy achieve what they want? Eye Candy is fired up with passion.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: After Ji Hyuk confesses his feelings for Su Ah, they become the roof top house couple. The sweet times don't last for long. Su Ah is now left alone on the roof top house because Eye Candy has to move into a dorm.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: On the brink of danger! Ji Hyuk comes to help, but Eye Candy ends up in a police car. HR entertainment enforces their policy on Eye Candy, banning them from outings, personal schedules, and even cell phones.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Eye Candy's risky stage debut helped them take over first place on the music charts program. As their popularity spikes, they hardly have any time for themselves.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Eye Candy's second single is ready! However, their new producer is none other than Yoo Seung Hoon!
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: As Ji Hyuk announces that he has a girlfriend, the press conference goes out of control and so does the rumor about Ji Hyuk and Su Ah living together.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hyuk decides to break up with Su Ah to protect her from getting hurt again. Su Ah also decides to let Ji Hyuk go for his music career. Will the roof top house couple come to an end?
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hyuk intentionally plays the bad guy to save Hyun Soo. This enables Hyun Soo to smoothly transition back into the entertainment industry.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: With the new opportunities in hand, Eye Candy is excited with the thought of getting back together. Eye Candy started out as friends who just like to be with one another. Will they be able to go on stage as Eye Candy again?
episodes.title: Episode 16
